full_summary:
# Publicly Available Specification (Standardized Specification Services)
### Contract Details

#### Contract Title
 Publicly Available Specification for Substance Use and Addiction Care

#### Reference Number
cb-6042-46360451

#### Tender Status
Expired

#### Solicitation Number
2023-05-31

#### Tender Closing Date
2023-06-15T16:00:00

### Project Overview

The Canadian Centre on Substance Use and Addiction (CCSA) was pre-selected to develop a Publicly Available Specification that guides non-specialist medical and/or social professionals in providing evidence-based and stepped-care approaches for addiction care. This specification will address several workforce challenges, incorporate best practices, and provide culturally safe and linguistically appropriate care.

### Rationale

The CCSA is a leading provider in substance use and addiction research, possessing existing resources and intellectual property to perform the work, including:

* A library of intellectual property on substance use and addictions related publications
* Creation and ownership of intellectual property for the National Framework for Action to Reduce the Harms Associated with Alcohol and Other Drugs and Substances in Canada (2017)

### Contact Information

* Contracting Authority: Standards Council of Canada
* Contracting Address: 55 Metcalfe, Suite 600, Ottawa, ON K1P 6L5
* Contact Person: Lianne Bernard
* Email: contract@scc.ca
* Phone: (613) 238-3222

### Documents

* Tender Notice: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6042/scc_acan_mhsuh-ccsa_2023-05-31_en.pdf (English)
* Tender Notice: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6042/scc_pac_smslcs-ccsa_2023-05-31_fr.pdf (French)

### Key Details

* Contract Duration: 2023-06-26 - 2024-02-29
* Expected Contract Start Date: 2023-06-26
* Expected Contract End Date: 2024-02-29
* Regions of Opportunity: Canada
* Regions of Delivery: Canada
* Unspsc: 80101703 (Specification standardization services)
